author: arxis75
content:
Hi.Trying to wrap my head around DiscV5 spec.
Concerning DiscV5 test vectors (https://github.com/ethereum/devp2p/blob/master/discv5/discv5-wire-test-vectors.md), the AES_GCM Encryption/Decryption test specifies that 16 byte MAC is prepended to the ciphertext. Is that correct? Shouldn't it be : 16 byte MAC is POSTpended to the ciphertext ? Thanx
